title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: My top 2 favorite seasons are actually Asylum & Coven.  I fell in love with Freak Show the 2nd time I binge watched it ❤️.  Pepper's story is heartbreaking.  Edward Moredrake is fascinating.  Sorry Mary, I know you praise Hotel, but it's sadly my least favorite.  I sat through it originally every episode hoping it would get better.  I Loved Queenie in it, but hated that they killed her off. I did love also having Billie Dean Howard back.  Gaga's "acting" was so stiff, I couldn't get past that.  The storylines were weak and stale for me and the oversaturated sex/violence was over the top and uncalled-for. Not my cup of tea.  I wanted more Horror element, and I felt Ryan put more sex in it for Gaga perhaps instead.
October 31, 2018 will be on a Wednesday... an episode on Halloween will be amazing!
I missed it.  :(     Will catch you next time and I can't wait.  :) You're AWESOME!

I hope they don't make Billy Eichner like Evan's BF or something stereotypical. I would love to see his serious/darker side again. It was such an awesome side of his acting range that took a lot of us fans of his by sursprise! I liked it, I loved it, I want some more of it! lol
If Angelica Huston even just did an episode or two arc I'd be satiated! Freaking love anything she is in!
DAMN! I missed it... these wednesday morning work shifts suck
description:
